Be familiar with SARMs and other similar compounds

Learn more

What are SARMs?

SARM or Selective Androgen Receptors Modulator is a compound group that shares similar working mechanisms upon ingestion. The way these substances work is to selectively choose androgen receptors and bind to them without disrupting other areas of your body. This type of drug was first developed in the 1940s; it wasn’t until the 1990s that SARMs became available for everyone.

If you haven’t heard about using these compounds for training routines, you’re probably curious why most recreational users vouch for these. Despite the lack of supporting studies on some SARM compounds, anecdotal reports from bodybuilders make them seem promising. Read on and discover how SARMs can change everyone’s fitness game.

Learn More

Use of SARMs

Generally, most SARMs are yet to be approved by the FDA for human consumption.

That being said, you can still purchase these compounds, but only under the label “Research Chemical”. You’re only allowed to use this for personal research purposes because it’s not yet deemed as a nutritional supplement.

Learn More

Explore SARMs

RAD 140 (Testolone)

RAD 140 or Testolone is a form of a Selective Androgen Receptor Modulator (SARM).

Testolone has been getting famous among professional athletes, including bodybuilders, primarily for its evident benefits in muscle strengthening and mass build-up.

Learn more. . .

Ostarine (MK-2866)

Ostarine is considered one of the most popular SARM (Selective Androgen Receptor Modulator) for bodybuilding.

For the past years, the buzz about Ostarine had grown, especially when many athletes and weightlifters tested positive for Ostarine.

Learn more. . .

Cardarine (GW501516)

Cardarine, also known as GW501516, is one of the popular supplements among athletes worldwide.

According to studies and cycle research, Cardarine is a potent compound for improving endurance levels and toning down fats.

Learn more. . .

MK-677 (IBUTAMOREN MESYLATE)

Ibutamoren, also known as MK-677, is primarily known for encouraging HGH (Human Growth Hormone) in the body.

Like other “Research Chemicals”, this substance is used by athletes and bodybuilders for their fitness cycles.

Learn more. . .

LGD-4033 (Ligandrol)

Ligandrol, also referred to as LGD-4033, is categorized as a Selective Androgen Receptor Modulator (SARM).

Ligandrol is known to have abilities on muscle growth and maintenance; this is why it is famous among athletes and bodybuilders.

Learn more. . .

Andarine (S-4)

Andarine, also referred to as S4, is categorized as a Selective Androgen Receptor Modulator or SARM.

Andarine focuses on handling fat loss and muscle growth. Most users vouch that this supplement is one of the most effective SARMs currently available.

Learn more. . .
